name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Nilou, equip this card.
After Nilou equips this card, immediately use Dance of Haftkarsvar.
When there is Nilou on the field who has this card equipped, the damage dealt by your Bountiful Core is increased by 1.
(You must have Nilou in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1208]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1208] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12082]</color>.
When there is $[A1208] on the field who has this card equipped, the damage dealt by your <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112082]</color> is increased by 1.
(You must have $[A1208] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Nilou</color>, equip this card.
After Nilou equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color>.
When there is Nilou on the field who has this card equipped, the damage dealt by your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bountiful Core</color> is increased by 1.
(You must have Nilou in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytitle: "The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain" Nilou
storytext: Seven heavens, passing like a radiant stream, as though a dream drawn into being.
source: Reward for inviting Nilou to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
